data:
## class_BaseWidgetDirective

An abstract base class for widget directives, providing common functionality
for Angular components that interact with widgets.

### Extended by

- [`AccordionItemComponent`](../components/accordion#accordionitemcomponent)
- [`AccordionDirective`](../components/accordion#accordiondirective)
- [`AlertComponent`](../components/alert#alertcomponent)
- [`CollapseDirective`](../components/collapse#collapsedirective)
- [`ModalComponent`](../components/modal#modalcomponent)
- [`PaginationComponent`](../components/pagination#paginationcomponent)
- [`ProgressbarComponent`](../components/progressbar#progressbarcomponent)
- [`RatingComponent`](../components/rating#ratingcomponent)
- [`SelectComponent`](../components/select#selectcomponent)
- [`SliderComponent`](../components/slider#slidercomponent)
- [`ToastComponent`](../components/toast#toastcomponent)
- [`TreeComponent`](../components/tree#treecomponent)
- [`CarouselComponent`](../components/carousel#carouselcomponent)
- [`DrawerComponent`](../components/drawer#drawercomponent)

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)

The type of the widget.

### Implements

- [`OnChanges`](https://angular.dev/api/core/OnChanges)
- [`OnInit`](https://angular.dev/api/core/OnInit)
- [`AfterContentChecked`](https://angular.dev/api/core/AfterContentChecked)

### Accessors

#### api

##### Get Signature

> **get** **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]


Retrieves the widget api

###### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

the widget api

***

#### directives

##### Get Signature

> **get** **directives**(): `W`\[`"directives"`\]


Retrieves the widget directives

###### Returns

`W`\[`"directives"`\]

the widget directives

***

#### state

##### Get Signature

> **get** **state**(): [`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>


Retrieves the widget state. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

###### Returns

[`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

the widget state

## function_callWidgetFactoryWithConfig
> **callWidgetFactoryWithConfig**\<`W`\>(`factory`, `options?`): [`AngularWidget`](../types#angularwidget)\<`W`\>


Call a widget factory using provided configs.

The resulting widget can be easily hooked into the lifecycle of an Angular component through [BaseWidgetDirective](#basewidgetdirective).

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

### Parameters

#### factory

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`\>

the widget factory to call

#### options?

the options

##### afterInit?

(`widget`) => `void`

a callback to call after successful setup of the widget

##### defaultConfig?

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| `undefined`\>

the default config of the widget

##### events?

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`Pick`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#picktype-keys)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>, keyof [`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\> & `` `on${string}` ``\>\>

the events of the widget

##### slotChildren?

() => [`TemplateRef`](https://angular.dev/api/core/TemplateRef)\<`void`\> \| `undefined`

a function to provide the default children slot using a view query

##### slotTemplates?

() => \{ \[K in string \| number \| symbol as IsSlotContent\<WidgetProps\<W\>\[K\]\> extends 0 ? never : K\]: WidgetProps\<W\>\[K\] extends SlotContent\<U\> ? TemplateRef\<U\> \| undefined : never \}

a function to provide all slot templates using child queries

##### widgetConfig?

[`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| `undefined`\> \| `null`

the config of the widget, overriding the defaultConfig

### Returns

[`AngularWidget`](../types#angularwidget)\<`W`\>

the widget

## function_createWidgetFactory
> **createWidgetFactory**\<`W`, `T`\>(`widgetName`, `factory`): [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`, `T`\>


Define a widget factory that can be linked with configuration through the provided widget name.

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

The type of the widget

#### T

`T` *extends* (`config?`) => `W` = (`config?`) => `W`

The type of the widget factory function. Useful when the widget factory has a generic.

### Parameters

#### widgetName

`string`

the widget name, used for configuration injection

#### factory

`T`

the widget factory function

### Returns

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`, `T`\>

the widget factory
